results.title: Case Report of a Rare Adrenocortical Oncocytoma Suspected to be an Adrenal Carcinoma.
results.text_hl: We present a case of a 55-year-old male @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with dyslipidaemia, medicated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. Upon complaints of @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@, the general physician asked for an abdominal ultrasound that revealed an @DISEASE_Adrenal_Gland_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D000307 @@@adrenal lesion@@@, further characterized with a computed tomography scan, which showed an @DISEASE_Adrenal_Gland_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D000307 @@@adrenal lesion@@@ measuring 49 x 64 x 56 mm and a @DISEASE_Calcinosis @DISEASE_MESH:D002114 @@@calcification@@@ focus.

citations.NLM: Ferreira Barros II, Manso F, Teixeira M, Silva Lopes Pereira MR. Case Report of a Rare Adrenocortical Oncocytoma Suspected to be an Adrenal Carcinoma. touchREV Endocrinol. 2021 Apr;17(1):71-74. PMID: 35118449
citations.BibTeX: @article{35118449, title={Case Report of a Rare Adrenocortical Oncocytoma Suspected to be an Adrenal Carcinoma.}, author={Ferreira Barros II and Manso F and Teixeira M and Silva Lopes Pereira MR}, journal={touchREV Endocrinol}, volume={17}, number={1}, pages={71-74}}

results.title: A 35-Year-Old Woman With Shock, Pulseless Electrical Activity Arrest, and Hemodynamic Collapse.
